H0.text: Marc Bolland has announced that he is to stand down as Chief Executive of which Major High Street Store. Tesco

H1.text: Marc Bolland has announced that he is to stand down as Chief Executive of which Major High Street Store. Sainsbury's

H2.text: Marc Bolland has announced that he is to stand down as Chief Executive of which Major High Street Store. John Lewis

H3.text: Marc Bolland has announced that he is to stand down as Chief Executive of which Major High Street Store. M&S

A4.text: In January 2016, it was announced that Bolland would be retiring as CEO of Marks and Spencer effective April 2016, and would be replaced by Steve Rowe.
